document_data.name: Ereshkin
document_data.mainbody: '''Shestandeliath Ereshkin''' was a [[dragonborn]] warrior member of [[Clan Shestandeliath]], and a rookie member of the [[Lance Defenders]] in [[1487 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Ereshkin was the cousin of [[Shestandeliath Parvida|Parvida]] and [[Shestandeliath Zaroshni|Zaroshni]].
document_data.History: In 1487 DR, Ereshkin was a rookie member of the Lance Defenders. She was one of the disciples of [[Verthisathurgiesh Arjhani]]. She was also one of the first converts to the new faith of [[Enlil]], after being convinced by [[Dumuzi]].
